entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Burns Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -20.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burns Lake Airport 2:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -20.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 74 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -24.0°C
Wind: W 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 21.
